LanguageData.R_SeasonedMeat.label: Seasoned meat
LanguageData.R_SeasonedMeat.description: Meat that eliminated the smell of meat with seasoning. It can be eaten raw but also cooked.
LanguageData.R_FreezeMochi.label: Freeze mochi
LanguageData.R_FreezeMochi.description: Mochi that can be stored for a long time.It can be eaten raw but also cooked.
LanguageData.ZP_RiceBranPickled.label: Nukaduke
LanguageData.ZP_RiceBranPickled.description: A preserved meal made vegetables in Nuka(rice bran).\nYou can eat raw this, and make for cooking.
LanguageData.ZP_DriedFish.label: Dried fish
LanguageData.ZP_DriedFish.description: A preserved food dried to keep raw fish from decaying.\nYou can eat raw this, and make for cooking.
LanguageData.ZP_FermentedSoybeans.label: Natto
LanguageData.ZP_FermentedSoybeans.description: Fermented Japanese food fermented Soybean with Bacillus Natto. \nYou can eat raw this, and make for cooking.
LanguageData.Rawtofu.label: Raw tofu
LanguageData.Rawtofu.description: タンパク質が豊富な大豆の加工食品。肉の代用品としても使える。\n生でも食べれて、調理にも使える。
LanguageData.ZP_Soymilk.label: Soymilk
LanguageData.ZP_Soymilk.description: 豆を搾って作った飲料。ミルクの代用品にもなる。\n生でも飲めて、調理にも使える。
LanguageData.Flour.label: Flour
LanguageData.ZP_Konnyaku.label: Konnyaku
LanguageData.ZP_Konnyaku.description: 里芋から作った加工食品。\n生でも食べれて、調理にも使える。
LanguageData.ZP_Tikuwa.label: Tikuwa
LanguageData.ZP_Tikuwa.description: 魚から作った加工食品。肉の代用品としても使える。\nYou can eat raw this, and make for cooking.
LanguageData.ZP_Tanpo.label: Tanpo
LanguageData.ZP_Tanpo.description: つぶしたお米を棒に巻きつけて焼いたもの。棒から外して切ったものを「きりたんぽ」という。\nYou can eat raw this, and make for cooking.
LanguageData.ZP_FishFillet.label: Fish fillet
LanguageData.ZP_FishFillet.description: 料理に使いやすいようにさばいた魚の切り身。\nYou can eat raw this, and make for cooking.
